import contextvars

class ThreadLocalIO:
    wkt_r = contextvars.ContextVar('wkt_r', default=None)
    wkt_w = contextvars.ContextVar('wkt_w', default=None)
    wkb_r = contextvars.ContextVar('wkb_r', default=None)
    wkb_w = contextvars.ContextVar('wkb_w', default=None)
    ewkb_w = contextvars.ContextVar('ewkb_w', default=None)
